ai-patthana13.19:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.19:1.1_0: In the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana13.19:1.1_2: Experiencing consciousness arises in him in the past, future cause or reason.
ai-patthana13.19:1.1_4: In the past, future, or present objects, there are no conditions for the past, future, and present.
ai-patthana13.19:1.1_5: In the past, future, or present objects, there are no conditions for the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana13.19:1.1_6: In the past, future, or present objects, there are no conditions for the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana13.19:1.1_7: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.19:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of a single object, but not having regrets.’ ...
